keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocating for the installation of a pedestrian crossing on Salvington Road due to its dangers for local school children.

mentions.candidate: Emma said, "Salvington Road needs a pedestrian crossing. It's such a dangerous road for our local school children."
mentions.tacticalSituation: Con and Lab lost seats. Results from May 2019 Local Elections.

leaflet.personalStatement: That's why I'm working with local people and chasing the council to get a new crossing. Our petition has so much local support. Please add your name to our campaign.

images.caption: From Bob Smytherman's local team - Dr Emma Norton for safe roads.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Lib Dems +704, Con -1330, Lab -84 - indicates a shift in previous local election results favoring the Liberal Democrats.
